name: AdvanceCarePlanningDocumentation
title: Advance Care Planning Documentation
purpose: (Clinical Focus: HCPCS Codes used to document advance care planning activity with a patient/caregiver),(Data Element Scope: HCPCS Codes used to document advance care planning activity with a patient/caregiver),(Inclusion Criteria: HCPCS Codes used to document advance care planning activity with a patient/caregiver),(Exclusion Criteria: Codes other than HCPCS Codes used to document advance care planning activities with patients/caregivers are not included.)

concept.display: Patient offered assistance with end of life issues or existing end of life plan was reviewed or updated during the measurement period

Counseling and discussion regarding advance directives or end of life care planning and decisions, with patient and/or surrogate (list separately in addition to code for appropriate evaluation and management service)
